name: Anti-armor Explosive Swift .50 Cal Machine Gun

bloody_mess.name: Bloody Mess
bloody_mess.info: {1}% bonus damage means enemies may explode into a gory red paste.

adrenaline.name: Adrenaline
adrenaline.info: Gain {1}% damage for 30s per kill. Duration refreshes with kills.

toft.name: TOFT
toft.info: Enemies take {1}% more damage when they attack you, if you're on a team.

tenderizer.name: Tenderizer
tenderizer.info: Make your target receive {1}% more damage for {1} seconds after you attack.

gun_fu.name: Gun Fu
gun_fu.info: V.A.T.S. swaps targets on kill with +{1}% damage to your next target.

incisor.name: Incisor
incisor.info: Your melee weapons ignore {1}% of your target's armor.

bow_before_me.name: Bow Before Me
bow_before_me.info: Your bows and crossbows ignore {1}% armor and have a {2}% chance to stagger.

exterminator.name: Exterminator
exterminator.info: Your attacks ignore {1}% armor of any insect.

tank_killer.name: Tank Killer
tank_killer.info: Your rifles and pistols ignore {1}% armor and have a {2}% chance to stagger.

stabilized.name: Stabilized
stabilized.info: In Power Armor, heavy guns gain more accuracy and ignore {1}% armor.

covert_operative.name: Covert Operative
covert_operative.info: Your ranged sneak attacks do {1}x normal damage.

mister_sandman.name: Mister Sandman
mister_sandman.info: At night your silenced weapons do an additional {1}% sneak attack damage.

ninja.name: Ninja
ninja.info: Sneak attacks with melee weapons do an additional {1}% sneak attack damage.

follow_through.name: Follow Through
follow_through.info: Ranged sneak damage increases damage to target by {1}% for 10 seconds.

nerd_rage.name: Nerd Rage
nerd_rage.info: While below 20% Health, gain {3} Damage Resist, {1}% damage and 15% AP regen.

martial_artist.name: Martial Artist
martial_artist.info: Your melee weapons weight {3}% less, and you can swing them {1}% faster.

scattershot.name: Scattershot
scattershot.info: Shotguns now weight {4}% less and you reload them {1}% faster.

ground_pounder.name: Ground Pounder
ground_pounder.info: Automatic rifles now reload {1}% faster and have better hip fire accuracy.

strange_in_numbers.name: Strange In Nums
strange_in_numbers.info: Positive mutation effects are {1}% stronger if teammates are mutated too.

class_freak.name: Class Freak
class_freak.info: The negative effects of your mutations are reduced by {1}%.
